name: MIELI Suomen Mielenterveys ry
goal: The mission of MIELI Mental Health Finland, MIELI ry is to support and promote good mental health, considered essential at all levels of society and in all spheres of life. As a non-governmental organisation MIELI ry stimulates interaction between individuals and communities, while activating people to work for the welfare of their own communities.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: All initiatives related to mental health, e.g. in thePublic Health Programme or Empolyment and Social Affairs
